prompt: A futuristic DAO governance hall with glowing neon circuitry on dark walls. Central holographic display showing the proposal title. A Governance Chamber with ambient blue holographic voting interface. A Treasury Vault in the distance with sealed vault doors and status indicators. Multiple AI agent sentinel figures in each zone glowing with alert colors. Proposal: "Will sentiment polls improve discussions about NounsDAO prop" as holographic text center stage. Atmosphere: dramatic sci-fi, dark ambient, high detail, panoramic 360.

detectedZones.meaning: Proposal addresses governance structure or voting parameters

spatialSummary: The spatial environment highlights 2 active zones: Governance Chamber, Governance Chamber. 2 agents are positioned across the space monitoring for risks. Overall spatial assessment: no critical spatial risk signals detected.
